translations: v．发生故障，失灵：指设备、机器或系统无法正常工作。
· The computer malfunctioned and lost all the data.
电脑出现故障，丢失了所有数据。

sentences.sentence: Tons of gold have fallen out of the sky in Russia after a cargo plane malfunctioned in mid-air this morning.
sentences.translation: 今天早上，俄罗斯一架货机在空中出现故障，数吨黄金从天而降。

sentences.sentence: Then the motor of their truck malfunctioned.
sentences.translation: 然后，他们卡车的发动机失灵了。

sentences.sentence: This means one of the partitions has malfunctioned.
sentences.translation: 这意味着分区中的一个出现了故障。
